gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 122, Hawks 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Giannis Antetokounmpo leads the Bucks with 36 points, 16 rebounds and eight assists as the Bucks defeat the Hawks, 122-113.  Khris Middleton added 21 points, six rebounds and six assists in the victory, while Bogdan Bogdanovic tallied 38 points, career-high 10 rebounds and four assists for the Hawks in the losing effort.  The Bucks improve to 47-27 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 34-40.
